net.creativeparkour

Class CPUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.creativeparkour.CPUtils

  • public class CPUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains many simple but useful methods used in CreativeParkour.
    Author:
    Obelus

      • truncatedStr

        public static java.lang.String truncatedStr(java.lang.String s,
                                            int maxLength)
        Truncates s string if it is longer than maxLength.
        Parameters:
        s - Input string to truncate.
        maxLength - Maximum length of the output string.
        Returns:
        Truncated string.

      • truncateStringEllipsis

        public static java.lang.String truncateStringEllipsis(java.lang.String s,
                                                      int maxLength)
        Truncates a string and adds ellipsis if it is too long.
        Parameters:
        s - String to truncate.
        maxLength - Length of the truncated string (with the ellipsis character).
        Returns:
        Truncated string with ellipsis at the end.

      • itemInHand

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemInHand(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Returns the item in player's hand (cross compatible between Minecraft versions).
        Parameters:
        p - Player we want to know the handled item.
        Returns:
        Item held by the player.

      • getSound

        public static org.bukkit.Sound getSound(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String oldName)
        Returns the sound corresponding one of the provided names (because some names changed in Minecraft 1.9).
        Parameters:
        name - Sound's name in the latest Minecraft version.
        oldName - Sound's name before 1.9.
        Returns:
        The actual sound.

      • playerScoreboardName

        public static java.lang.String playerScoreboardName(java.lang.String uuid)
        Returns a player's name (corresponding to a given UUID), truncated if necessary to fit in scoreboards.
        Parameters:
        uuid - String representation of the UUID of the player we want the name.
        Returns:
        Player's name adapted to scoreboards.

      • playerScoreboardName

        public static java.lang.String playerScoreboardName(java.lang.String uuid,
                                                    net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor color)
        Returns a player's name (corresponding to a given UUID), truncated if necessary to fit in scoreboards.
        Parameters:
        uuid - String representation of the UUID of the player we want the name.
        color - ChatColor in which we want to display the name.
        Returns:
        Player's name adapted to scoreboards.

      • scoreboardName

        public static java.lang.String scoreboardName(java.lang.String name,
                                              net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor color)
        Returns the given player name, truncated if necessary to fit in scoreboards.
        Parameters:
        name - Player name to truncate (or any string, it does not matter).
        color - ChatColor in which we want to display the name.
        Returns:
        name adapted to scoreboards.

      • parseCoordinates

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> parseCoordinates(java.lang.String s)
        Parses the given string to get coordinates (the string must be like "<X coord>;<Y coord>;<Z coord>").
        Parameters:
        s - String to parse (like 22;42;44).
        Returns:
        Map containing X, Y and Z coordinates.
        map.get('x') is the X coordinate.
        map.get('y') is the Y coordinate.
        map.get('z') is the Z coordinate.

      • timeFileUUIDs

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.UUID> timeFileUUIDs(java.lang.String fileName)
        Splits a parkour map UUID and a player UUID in a CreativeParkour time file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file.
        Returns:
        Parkour map UUID ("map" key) and player's UUID ("player" key).

      • getYML

        public static org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration getYML(java.io.File file)
        Loads a YML file and returns its YamlConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to load.
        Returns:
        YamlConfiguration contained in file.

      • sendClickableMsg

        public static void sendClickableMsg(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                                    java.lang.String text,
                                    java.lang.String command,
                                    java.lang.String url,
                                    java.lang.String linkTags,
                                    net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor backgroundColor)
        Sends a clickable message (with a link or a command) to a player.
        Parameters:
        p - Player to send the message to.
        text - Complete message text.
        command - Executed command when the player clicks the link (or null to send an URL).
        url - Link's URL (if command = null).
        linkTags - Tag delimiting the link.
        backgroundColor - ChatColor of the other text than the link delimited by the tags.

      • sendInfoMessage

        public static void sendInfoMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                                   java.lang.String text)
        Sends an information message to a player (ⓘ <message>).
        Parameters:
        p - Player to sent the message to.
        text - Text of the message.

        Returns:
        Resulting string.

      • coordsToString

        public static java.lang.String coordsToString(int x,
                                              int y,
                                              int z)
        Creates a string representing the 3 given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate
        z - Z coordinate
        Returns:
        Resulting string ("<X coord>;<Y coord>;<Z coord>")

      • blockTouched

        public static boolean blockTouched(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                                   org.bukkit.Location l)
        Returns true if a player at the given location is touching the given block.
        Parameters:
        block - Block to test
        l - Location to test
        Returns:
        Whether or not a player at the location would touch the block.

      • bracket

        public static java.lang.String bracket(java.lang.String s)
        Puts the s string between symbols chosen in CreativeParkour's configuration.
        Parameters:
        s - String to bracket.
        Returns:
        Given string surrounded by brackets.

      • reponseRegister

        public static void reponseRegister(com.google.gson.JsonObject json,
                                   java.lang.String rep,
                                   org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
                            throws CPRequest.InvalidQueryResponseException
        Third-party plugins cannot use this method through CreativeParkour's API (it will throw an InvalidQueryResponseException).
        Method called when creativeparkour.net responds to a query.
        Parameters:
        json -
        rep -
        p -
        Throws:
        CPRequest.InvalidQueryResponseException - If the Request has not been registered before.

        Returns the list of YML files in the given folder.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • itemStackIsEmpty

        public static boolean itemStackIsEmpty(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Returns true if the given ItemStack is empty (because sometimes it is null, sometimes it contains Material.AIR).
        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack to check.
        Returns:
        Whether or not item is empty.

      • divideText

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> divideText(java.lang.String text,
                                                          net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor color)
        Divides the text in several lines by splitting it at some spaces.
        This is supposed to be used to make long texts readable in ItemStack lore.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to split.
        color - Text's color (or null to not set any color).
        Returns:
        Paragraph lines in a list.

      • diviserTexte

        @Deprecated
public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> diviserTexte(java.lang.String text,
                                                                         net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor color)
        Deprecated. 
        See Also:
        divideText(String, ChatColor)

      • dividedTextToString

        public static java.lang.String dividedTextToString(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines)
        Returns all the Strings in the List in one single String, with line breaks between lines.
        Parameters:
        lines - List of paragraph's lines.
        Returns:
        A String containing all the lines.
